text: @realDonaldTrump So I hear New Zealand has largely beat COVID-19 by shutting down early and thoroughly, and Cuba is doing a great job using a variant of an old drug, Interferon. I'm not telling you this to slam on your performance, but because it might be useful information to consider.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.
